metadata.Title: CVE-2023-34153 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A vulnerability was found in ImageMagick. This security flaw causes a shell command injection vulnerability via video:vsync or video:pixel-format options in VIDEO encoding/decoding.

notes.Note: rodrigo-zaiden> does not affect ImageMagick6. there is no current ImageMagick6 version in Ubuntu supporting vsync or pixel-format.

criterions.comment: imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
